amendment.description: An amendment numbered 435 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to reinstate standard Congressional Notification procedures for the export of certain items to foreign countries.
amendment.purpose: Amendment reinstates standard Congressional Notification procedures for the export of certain items to foreign countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A031) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215 - 213 (Roll no. 292).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A031) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A031) offered by Mrs. Torres (CA).
